title: A brief introduction to interval arithmetic (buttondown.email/hillelwayne)
first_paragraph: You've got a wall in your apartment and a couch. You measure the wall with a ruler and get 7 feet, then you measure the couch and get 7 feet. Can you fit the couch against that wall?
